and Hitler'' at secondary school, and many gave up the subject at 14, without grasping a connected narrative. Mr Michael Gove has already asked the historian Simon Schama to advise on how British history could be put at the heart of a revised national curriculum . The new curriculum in the core subjects of maths, English, science and PE will be introduced from September 2013, Mr Michael Gove said, with other subjects brought in the following year.

statement. Satya Nadella replaces Microsoft veteran Bob Muglia as head of the highly profitable server business. Steve Ballmer took the unusual step in January of publicly announcing that he thought Bob Muglia was no longer fit for the job. This is simply a recognition that all businesses go through cycles and need new and different talent to manage through those cycles, Steve Ballmer wrote at the time. While Steve Ballmer was vague about the reasons, analysts believed that the CEO had lost faith in Bob Muglia 's ability to lead the company into the next generation of enterprise computing.

Game 3 of the Travis Best-of-five Eastern Conference quarterfinals is Saturday in Indiana.`` I'm going to remember this game for a long time,'' said Allen Iverson , who also had nine assists. I've been playing a lot off my God-given ability. This game took a lot of thinking. I'm pleased with my mental aspect coming into the game... When guys doubled me, I found my teammates and they hit the shots. I don't think I forced too many things.
